fields.name: **Q2. Is this legal/safe, and will I get banned?**
fields.value: > This is 100% legal and safe. Nothing about this will get you banned.

fields.name: **Q3. Can I order max bells?**
fields.value: > NO, you can order royal crowns or golden nuggets and a full inventory of those sells for 12mil bells, the bot can not give you max bells.

fields.name: **Q4. Can I order poki for HHP?**
fields.value: > No, poki can't be ordered through the bot. It's exclusive to the DLC, and can't leave the DLC island

fields.name: **Q5. How do I kick a villager out so I can get one from the bot?**
fields.value:
> Follow this guide or Google it. 
> <https://game8.co/games/Animal-Crossing-New-Horizons/archives/285170>

fields.name: **Q6. Can I order plants from the bot?**
fields.value: > Yes, trees will just show up as tiny trees that you can pick up and store in your pockets, same as any other item. Flowers are the same way. They'll just show up as tiny brown seeds

fields.name: **Q7. Can I get glowing moss or vines from the bot?**
fields.value:
> Yes, but you have to use these codes or it won't work.
> 3107 (vine) and 3106 (moss)

fields.name: **Q8. I ordered a DIY but when I got back to my island it was gone, what the fuck happened Abel?**
fields.value:
> I'll tell you what the fuck happened.
> There is a list of DIY that aren't flyable meaning you have to learn them on the island or they disappear. Click the link below for the full list.
<https://docs.google.com/document/d/1j7kbG0zRiSyZZWX2lIQANVvDPndlF9sMQoGeEFdqg4k/edit?usp=sharing>
